# Mohammad Yasin

I am a Master of Business Analytics student at Monash University, with a strong passion for data-driven projects across various industries. If you have any inquiries or would like to collaborate on a project, feel free to get in touch using the links provided.

## My Interests:
- Data Analytics and Business Intelligence
- Machine Learning and Predictive Modelling
- Data Communication and Visualization
- Supply Chain Analytics
- Statistical Analysis and Workflow Automation

I am committed to the re-use of historical datasets and performing transparent analysis, while ensuring the privacy of the individuals whose data is being analyzed. I have an active GitHub profile where you can find many of my publicly available projects.

Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn, GitHub, or through any of the platforms listed above!
